name: ByteCraft
description:
ByteCraft is a cyberpunk tug of war strategy game where the core gameplay consists of designing your own units and balancing your resources. ByteCraft was a finalist in LiU Game Awards 2013.

How to play

  • We recomend trying singleplayer and easy AI first.
  • Click on a building place (yellow marker) to select it. You can spend resources to constuct a building or module on it.
  • You do not have direct control over your units, they will automatically attack the enemy base.
  • Build factories to spawn more units.
  • Build modules on your factories to upgrade your units.
  • Some modules can be expanded on with more modules.

Keybinds

  • W A S D Move camera
  • Mouse wheel Zoom camera
  • Left Click Select and build
  • Q E - Rotate camera
  • C V - Zoom camera
